member.summary: New implementation of the base SchemaObject property.

member.name: T:NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.Traverser
member.summary: Class responsible for building the visitable tree from a file containing an XSD Schema.

member.name: T:NMatrix.XGoF.ITraverser
member.summary: Interface for use by extenders to provide custom traversing of the XmlSchema.

member.name: M:NMatrix.XGoF.ITraverser.Traverse(System.String)
member.summary: Starts traversal of the file passed and returns the loaded component.
member.param: The source file to traverse.

member.name: M:NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.Traverser.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.Traverser.Traverse(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the traversing with the XmlSchema.
member.param: The schema file to traverse.
member.returns: An IVisitableComponent containing all the visitable nodes.

member.name: M:NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.Traverser.Build(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute,NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.BaseSchemaTypedElement)
member.summary: Builds an IVisitableComponent with the attribute passed.
member.param: The attribute to use to build the visitable component.
The parent element of the visitable component to build.
member.remarks: If attribute type is a named simple type, that will be the typeName used for the component if IterationType.ComplexType is selected. Otherwise, the same naming convention for unnamed simpletypes is followed. If the simple type is unnamed, the attribute name plus the TypeNaming is used as the typeName parameter for component.

member.name: M:NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.Traverser.Build(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement,NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.BaseSchemaTypedElement)
member.summary: Builds an IVisitableComponent with the element passed.
member.param: The element to use to build the visitable component.
The parent element of the visitable component to build.
member.remarks: If element type is a named complex type, the component typeName will depend on the IterationType selected in the configuration. So it IterationType.ComplexElements is selected, the typeName will be the element name plus the TypeNaming convention specified. Else, the ComplexType name is used. If it is a simple type, the simple type name is used. If the type is unnamed, the element name plus the TypeNaming is used.

member.name: M:NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.Traverser.RecurseElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement,System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType,System.String,System.String,NMatrix.XGoF.XSD.BaseSchemaTypedElement)
member.summary: Traverses a complex element.
member.param: The current element.
The current element type.
The element name.
The element type name, that is, name + typeNaming.
The parent of the element received.
member.returns: The IVisitableComponent to add to the composite parent.

The string to append to the type name for class names.
